Fable.Title: Jokull
Fable.Description: A story of ice and mystery.

Location.Name: BlackBeach
Location.Title: Black sand beach
Location.Introduction: You find yourself resting on the sand with no rememberence of how you came here or who you are.

Fact.Text: The beach stretches as far as you can see to the east and west.
Black sand covers all the beach.
The sea is calm and stretches to infinity without interruptions.
Soft mountains rises in the distance to the north. A huge glacier tops the central mountain.

Exit.Name: East
Exit.Title: East
Exit.Description: The beach stretches to the east.

Location.Name: BlackBeachEast
Location.Title: Eastern end of black sand beach

Fact.Text: The beach stretches as far as you can see to the west.
Black sand covers all the beach.
The sea is calm and stretches to infinity without interruptions.
Soft mountains rises in the distance to the north. A huge glacier tops the central mountain.

Exit.Name: West
Exit.Title: West
Exit.Description: The beach stretches to the west.

Exit.Name: East
Exit.Title: East
Exit.Description: The beach continous to the east

Fact.Text: At the shore of a lagoon full of icebergs. The water is black and quiet.
To the north a glacier tongue flows down from the distant glacier that tops the mountains.
A bridge can be seen to the east.
Something glimmer like diamonds on the beach to the south.
A small tool shack is located to the north.

Exit.Name: West
Exit.Title: West
Exit.Description: The beach stretches to the west.

Exit.Name: North
Exit.Title: North
Exit.Description: A small tool schack can be seen by the lagoon to the north.

Fact.Text: Inside a tool shack. Light is dim but not completely dark.
It smells of oil and old stuff.

Exit.Name: South
Exit.Title: South
Exit.Description: A door to the south leads out of the tool schack.

Fact.Text: On a remote peninsula where high cliffs meet the sea.
Cries from distant shalkren floating on the wind can be heard.
Shalkren are grey/white birds with long sleek wings, build to float on the wind.
At the edge of the cliffs a small Tervuun nests.
Tervuun are small birds with colored beaks. They nest on the cliffs and catches fish in the ocean.
A smell of old fish fills the air.

Exit.Name: West
Exit.Title: West
Exit.Description: A gentle slope leads west to the black beach.
